"[77-odu] " Tell [me]603-another more about [him]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace . "[603-another] " [He]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace came down [the hill]3451-the hill very black , walking like [a bad giant]3660-a bad giant , but spread flat . [He]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was nothing but blackness . [We]3661-we were frightened the moment [we]3661-we saw [him]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace , but [we]3661-we did not run away ; [we]3661-we stood and watched [him]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace . [He]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace came on as if [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace would walk over [us]3661-we . But before [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace reached [us]3661-we , [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace began to spread and spread , and grew bigger end bigger , till at last [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was so big that [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace went out of [our]3661-we sight , and [we]3661-we saw [him]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace no more , and then [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was upon [us]3661-we ! "[603-another] " What do [you]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace mean by that ? "[77-odu] " [He]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was all black through between [us]3661-we , and [we]3661-we could not see [one another]2951-one another ; and then [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was inside [us]3661-we . "[603-another] " How did [you]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace know [he]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace was inside [you]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace ? "[603-another] " [He]3655-a man that came down the hill from the palace did [me]1999-i quite different . [I]1999-i felt like bad . [I]1999-i was not [Odu]77-odu any more — not the Odu [I]1999-i knew . [I]1999-i wanted to tear [Sozo]79-sozo to pieces — not really , but like ! "[1999-i] [He]1999-i turned and hugged [Sozo]79-sozo . " It was n't [me]1999-i , [Sozo]79-sozo , "[1999-i] [he]1999-i sobbed . " Really , deep down , it was [Odu]77-odu , loving [you]79-sozo always ! And [Odu]77-odu came up , and knocked [Naughty]80-naughty away . [I]1999-i grew sick , and thought [I]1999-i must kill [myself]1999-i to get out of the black . Then came a horrible laugh that had heard [my]1999-i think , and it set the air trembling about [me]1999-i . And then [I]1999-i suppose [I]1999-i ran away , but [I]1999-i did not know [I]1999-i had run away until [I]1999-i found [myself]1999-i running , fast as could , and all the rest running too . [I]1999-i would have stopped , but [I]1999-i never thought of it until [I]1999-i was out of the gate among the grass . Then [I]1999-i knew that [I]1999-i had run away from a shadow that wanted to be [me]1999-i and was n't , and that [I]1999-i was [the Odu that loved [Sozo]79-sozo]3663-the odu that loved sozo . It was the shadow that got into [me]1999-i , and hated [him]79-sozo from inside [me]1999-i ; it was not [my]1999-i own self [me]1999-i ! And now [I]1999-i know that [I]1999-i ought not to have run away ! But indeed [I]1999-i did not quite know what [I]1999-i was doing until it was done ! [My]1999-i legs did it , [I]1999-i think : [they]3664-they grew frightened , and forgot [me]1999-i , and ran away ! Naughty legs ! There ! and there ! "[1999-i] Thus ended [Odu]77-odu , with a kick to each of [his]77-odu naughty legs . " What became of the shadow ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked . " [I]77-odu do not know , "[77-odu] [he]77-odu answered . " [I]77-odu suppose [he]77-odu went [home]2676-home into the night where there is no moon . "[77-odu] [I]0-i fell a wondering where [Lona]44-lona was gone , and dropping on the grass , took the dead thing in [my]0-i lap , and whispered in [its]44-lona ear , " Where are [you]44-lona , [Lona]44-lona ? [I]0-i love [you]44-lona ! "[0-i] But its lips gave no answer . [I]0-i kissed [them]2000-them , not quite cold , laid the body down again , and appointing [a guard over it]2001-a guard over it , rose to provide for the safety of [[Lona]44-lona 's people]2002-lona 's people during the night . Before the sun went down , [I]0-i had set a watch over [the princess]3100-the princess outside [the camp]2004-the camp , and [sentinels]2005-sentinels round [it]2004-the camp : intending to walk about it [myself]0-i all night long , [I]0-i told [the rest of [the army]1831-the army]2006-the rest of the army to go to sleep . [They]2006-the rest of the army threw [themselves]2006-the rest of the army on the grass and were asleep in a moment . When the moon rose [I]0-i caught a glimpse of something white ; it was [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess . [She]3280-the leopardess swept silently round [the sleeping camp]2009-the sleeping camp , and [I]0-i saw [her]3280-the leopardess pass three times between [the princess]3100-the princess and [the Little Ones]633-the little ones . Thereupon [I]0-i made the watch lie down with [the others]754-the others , and stretched [myself]0-i beside the body of [Lona]44-lona . IN the morning [we]2013-we set out , and made for [the forest]314-the forest as fast as [we]2013-we could . [I]0-i rode [Lona]44-lona 's horse , and carried [her]44-lona body . [I]0-i would take it to [[her]44-lona father]2015-her father : [he]2015-her father would give [it]2016-it a couch in [the chamber of [his]2015-her father dead]2017-the chamber of his dead ! or , if [he]2015-her father would not , seeing [she]44-lona had not come of [herself]44-lona , [I]0-i would watch it in [the desert]3065-the desert until it mouldered away ! But [I]0-i believed [he]2015-her father would , for surely [she]44-lona had died long ago ! Alas , how bitterly must [I]0-i not humble [myself]0-i before [him]2015-her father ! To [Adam]58-adam [I]0-i must take [Lilith]66-lilith also . [I]0-i had no power to make [her]66-lilith repent ! [I]0-i had hardly a right to slay [her]66-lilith — much less a right to let [her]66-lilith loose in [the world]108-the world ! and surely [I]0-i scarce merited being made for ever [[her]66-lilith gaoler]2020-her gaoler ! Again and again , on the way , [I]0-i offered [her]66-lilith food ; but [she]66-lilith answered only with a look of hungering hate . [Her]66-lilith fiery eyes kept rolling to and fro , nor ever closed , [I]0-i believe , until [we]2021-we reached [the other side of [the hot stream]1020-the hot stream]2022-the other side of the hot stream . After that [they]2024-they never opened until [we]2021-we came to [the House of Bitterness]2025-the house of bitterness . One evening , as [we]2021-we were camping for the night , [I]0-i saw [a little girl]616-a little girl go up to [her]66-lilith , and ran to prevent mischief . But ere [I]0-i could reach [them]616-a little girl , [the child]698-the child had put something to the lips of [the princess]3100-the princess , and given a scream of pain . " Please , [king]3570-king , "[698-the child] [she]698-the child whimpered , " suck finger . [Bad giantess]3667-bad giantess make hole in it ! "[0-i] [I]0-i sucked the tiny finger . " Well now ! "[698-the child] [she]698-the child cried , and a minute after was holding a second fruit to a mouth greedy of other fare . But this time [she]698-the child snatched [her]698-the child hand quickly away , and the fruit fell to the ground . [The child]698-the child 's name was [Luva]81-luva . The next day [we]2021-we crossed [the hot stream]1020-the hot stream . Again on [[their]616-a little girl own ground]2031-their own ground , [the Little Ones]633-the little ones were jubilant . But [[their]616-a little girl nests]1540-their nests were still at a great distance , and that day [we]2021-we went no farther than [the ivy - hall]2034-the ivy - hall , where , because of [its]2034-the ivy - hall grapes , [I]0-i had resolved to spend the night . When [they]633-the little ones saw the great clusters , at once [they]633-the little ones knew [them]633-the little ones good , rushed upon [them]633-the little ones , ate eagerly , and in a few minutes were all fast asleep on the green floor and in [the forest around [the hall]185-the hall]2035-the forest around the hall . Hoping again to see the dance , and expecting [the Little Ones]47-the little ones to sleep through it , [I]0-i had made [them]47-the little ones leave a wide space in the middle . [I]0-i lay down among [them]47-the little ones , with [Lona]44-lona by [my]0-i side , but did not sleep . The night came , and suddenly [the company]927-the company was there . [I]0-i was wondering with [myself]0-i whether , night after night , [they]47-the little ones would thus go on dancing to all eternity , and whether [I]0-i should not one day have to join [them]47-the little ones because of [my]0-i stiff - neckedness , when the eyes of [the children]2965-the children came open , and [they]47-the little ones sprang to [their]47-the little ones feet , wide awake . Immediately [every one]2818-every one caught hold of [a dancer]2040-a dancer , and away [they]47-the little ones went , bounding and skipping . [The spectres]2041-the spectres seemed to see and welcome [them]47-the little ones : perhaps [they]2041-the spectres knew all about [the Little Ones]47-the little ones , for [they]2041-the spectres had [themselves]2041-the spectres long been on [their]2041-the spectres way back to childhood ! Anyhow , [their]47-the little ones innocent gambols must , [I]0-i thought , bring refreshment to [weary souls who , [their]47-the little ones present taken from [them]47-the little ones and [their]47-the little ones future dark , had no life save the shadow of [their]47-the little ones vanished past]2042-weary souls who , their present taken from them and their future dark , had no life save the shadow of their vanished past . Many a merry but never a rude prank did [the children]2965-the children play ; and if [they]2965-the children did at times cause a momentary jar in the rhythm of the dance , [the poor spectres , who had nothing to smile withal]2044-the poor spectres , who had nothing to smile withal , at least manifested no annoyance . Just ere the morning began to break , [I]0-i started to see [the skeleton - princess in the doorway]2045-the skeleton - princess in the doorway , [her]2045-the skeleton - princess in the doorway eyes open and glowing , the fearful spot black on [her]2045-the skeleton - princess in the doorway side . [She]2045-the skeleton - princess in the doorway stood for a moment , then came gliding in , as if [she]2045-the skeleton - princess in the doorway would join the dance . [I]0-i sprang to [my]0-i feet . A cry of repugnant fear broke from [the children]2965-the children , and the lights vanished . But the low moon looked in , and [I]0-i saw [them]2965-the children clinging to [each other]2772-each other . The ghosts were gone — at least [they]2965-the children were no longer visible . [The princess]3100-the princess too had disappeared . [I]0-i darted to the spot where [I]0-i had left [her]3100-the princess : [she]3100-the princess lay with [her]3100-the princess eyes closed , as if [she]3100-the princess had never moved . [I]0-i returned to [the hall]185-the hall . [The Little Ones]633-the little ones were already on the floor , composing [themselves]633-the little ones to sleep . The next morning , as [we]2051-we started , [we]2051-we spied , a little way from [us]2051-we , [two skeletons moving about in a thicket]2052-two skeletons moving about in a thicket . [The Little Ones]47-the little ones broke [their]2052-two skeletons moving about in a thicket ranks , and ran to [them]2052-two skeletons moving about in a thicket . [I]0-i followed ; and , although now walking at ease , without splint or ligature , [I]0-i was able to recognise [the pair [I]0-i had before seen in [that neighbourhood]2054-that neighbourhood]2053-the pair i had before seen in that neighbourhood . [The children]2965-the children at once made [friends]647-friends with [them]2053-the pair i had before seen in that neighbourhood , laying hold of [their]2053-the pair i had before seen in that neighbourhood arms , and stroking the bones of [their]2053-the pair i had before seen in that neighbourhood long fingers ; and it was plain [the poor creatures]2057-the poor creatures took [their]2053-the pair i had before seen in that neighbourhood attentions kindly . [The two]2058-the two seemed on excellent terms with each other . [Their]2058-the two common deprivation had drawn [them]2058-the two together ! the loss of everything had been the beginning of a new life to [them]2058-the two ! Perceiving that [they]2058-the two had gathered handfuls of herbs , and were looking for more — presumably to rub [their]2058-the two bones with , for in what other way could nourishment reach [their]2058-the two system so rudimentary?—the Little Ones , having keenly examined those [they]2058-the two held , gathered of the same sorts , and filled the hands the skeletons held out to receive [them]2058-the two . Then [they]2058-the two bid [them]2058-the two goodbye , promising to come and see [them]2058-the two again , and resumed [their]2058-the two journey , saying to [each other]2772-each other [they]2058-the two had not known there were [such nice people living in [the same forest]2061-the same forest]2060-such nice people living in the same forest . When [we]2062-we came to [the nest - village]2063-the nest - village , [I]0-i remained there a night with [them]2058-the two , to see [them]2058-the two resettled ; for [Lona]44-lona still looked like [one just dead]2064-one just dead , and there seemed no need of haste . [The princess]3100-the princess had eaten nothing , and [her]3100-the princess eyes remained shut : fearing [she]3100-the princess might die ere [we]2062-we reached the end of [our]2062-we journey , [I]0-i went to [her]3100-the princess in the night , and laid [my]0-i bare arm upon [her]3100-the princess lips . [She]3100-the princess bit into it so fiercely that [I]0-i cried out . How [I]0-i got away from [her]3100-the princess [I]0-i do not know , but [I]0-i came to [myself]0-i lying beyond [her]3100-the princess reach . It was then morning , and immediately [I]0-i set about [our]2062-we departure . Choosing twelve Little Ones , not of the biggest and strongest , but of [the sweetest and merriest]2066-the sweetest and merriest , [I]0-i mounted [them]2067-them on six elephants , and took two more of [the wise clumsies]2068-the wise clumsies , as [the children]2965-the children called [them]2067-them , to bear [the princess]3100-the princess . [I]0-i still rode [Lona]44-lona 's horse , and carried [her]44-lona body wrapt in [her]44-lona cloak before [me]0-i . As nearly as [I]0-i could judge [I]0-i took the direct way , across [the left branch of [the river - bed]554-the river - bed]2071-the left branch of the river - bed , to [the House of [Bitterness]14-bitterness]2025-the house of bitterness , where [I]0-i hoped to learn how best to cross [the broader and rougher branch]2074-the broader and rougher branch , and how to avoid [the basin of monsters]2075-the basin of monsters : [I]0-i dreaded the former for the elephants , the latter for [the children]2965-the children . [I]0-i had one terrible night on the way — the third , passed in [the desert]3065-the desert between [the two branches of [the dead river]2079-the dead river]2078-the two branches of the dead river . [We]2080-we had stopped the elephants in a sheltered place , and there let [the princess]3100-the princess slip down between [them]2082-them , to lie on the sand until the morning . [She]3100-the princess seemed quite dead , but [I]0-i did not think [she]3100-the princess was . [I]0-i laid [myself]0-i a little way from [her]3100-the princess , with the body of [Lona]44-lona by [my]0-i other side , thus to keep watch at once over the dead and the dangerous . The moon was half - way down [the west]2083-the west , a pale , thoughtful moon , mottling [the desert]3065-the desert with shadows . Of a sudden [she]3100-the princess was eclipsed , remaining visible , but sending forth no light : a thick , diaphanous film covered [her]3100-the princess patient beauty , and [she]3100-the princess looked troubled . The film swept a little aside , and [I]0-i saw the edge of it against [her]3100-the princess clearness — the jagged outline of a batlike wing , torn and hooked . Came a cold wind with a burning sting — and [Lilith]66-lilith was upon [me]0-i . [Her]3100-the princess hands were still bound , but with [her]3100-the princess teeth [she]3100-the princess pulled from [my]0-i shoulder the cloak [Lona]44-lona made for [me]0-i , and fixed them in [my]0-i flesh . [I]0-i lay as [one paralysed]2085-one paralysed . Already the very life seemed flowing from [me]0-i into [her]3100-the princess , when [I]0-i remembered , and struck [her]3100-the princess on the hand . [She]3100-the princess raised [her]3100-the princess head with a gurgling shriek , and [I]0-i felt [her]3100-the princess shiver . [I]0-i flung [her]3100-the princess from [me]0-i , and sprang to [my]0-i feet . [She]3100-the princess was on [her]3100-the princess knees , and rocked [herself]3100-the princess to and fro . A second blast of hot - stinging cold enveloped [us]2086-us ; the moon shone out clear , and [I]0-i saw [her]3100-the princess face — gaunt and ghastly , besmeared with red . " Down , [devil]3668-devil ! "[0-i] [I]0-i cried . " Where are [you]0-i taking [me]3100-the princess ? "[0-i] " Please , [king]3570-king , "[2690-one] said [one]2690-one , " [I]2690-one 'm so afraid of being afraid ! "[2690-one] " [[My]0-i boy]3708-my boy , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered , " there is no harm in being afraid . The only harm is in doing what [Fear]84-fear tells [you]2094-you . [Fear]84-fear is not [[your]2094-you master]3709-your master ! Laugh in [his]3709-your master face and [he]3709-your master will run away . "[0-i] " There [she]3705-a good lady is — in the door waiting for [us]3710-us ! "[2690-one] cried [one]2690-one , and put [his]2690-one hands over [his]2690-one eyes . " How ugly [she]3705-a good lady is ! "[603-another] cried [another]603-another , and did the same . " [You]2098-you do not see [her]3705-a good lady , "[0-i] [I]0-i said ; " [her]3705-a good lady face is covered ! "[0-i] " [She]3705-a good lady has no face ! "[2098-you] [they]2098-you answered . " [She]3705-a good lady has a very beautiful face . [I]0-i saw it once.—It is indeed as beautiful as [Lona]44-lona 's ! "[0-i] [I]0-i added with a sigh . " Then what makes [her]3705-a good lady hide it ? "[0-i] " [I]0-i think [I]0-i know:—anyhow , [she]3705-a good lady has some good reason for it ! " [Lilith]66-lilith 's hour has been long on the way , but it is come ! Everything comes . Thousands of years have [I]36-mara waited — and not in vain ! "[36-mara] [She]36-mara came to [me]0-i , took [my]0-i treasure from [my]0-i arms , carried it into [the house]112-the house , and returning , took [the princess]3100-the princess . [Lilith]66-lilith shuddered , but made no resistance . The beasts lay down by the door . [We]2100-us followed [[our]2100-us hostess]2103-our hostess , [the Little Ones]47-the little ones looking very grave . "[2103-our hostess] [The pitiful - hearted Little Ones]2106-the pitiful - hearted little ones began to sob sorely . " Will [you]27-mr. vane hurt [her]995-this woman very much , [lady Mara]36-mara ? "[36-mara] " Will the shadow that came down [the hill]3451-the hill be with [her]995-this woman ? [She]995-this woman will know [I]36-mara am beside [her]995-this woman , but that will not comfort [her]995-this woman . "[36-mara] " Will [you]2108-her scratch [her]995-this woman very deep ? "[77-odu] asked [Odu]77-odu , going near , and putting [his]77-odu hand in [hers]2108-her . " Please , do n't make the red juice come ! "[2108-her] [She]2108-her caught [him]77-odu up , turned [her]2108-her back to [the rest of [us]2110-us]2109-the rest of us , drew the muffling down from [her]2108-her face , and held [him]77-odu at arms ' length that [he]77-odu might see [her]2108-her . As if [his]77-odu face had been a mirror , [I]0-i saw in it what [he]77-odu saw . For one moment [he]77-odu stared , [his]77-odu little mouth open ; then a divine wonder arose in [his]77-odu countenance , and swiftly changed to intense delight . For a minute [he]77-odu gazed entranced , then [she]2108-her set [him]77-odu down . Yet a moment [he]77-odu stood looking up at [her]2108-her , lost in contemplation — then ran to [us]2110-us with the face of [a prophet that knows a bliss [he]77-odu can not tell]2111-a prophet that knows a bliss he can not tell . [Mara]36-mara rearranged [her]36-mara mufflings , and turned to [the other children]2112-the other children . " [You]2112-the other children must eat and drink before [you]2112-the other children go to sleep , "[36-mara] [she]36-mara said ; " [you]2112-the other children have had a long journey ! "[36-mara] [She]36-mara set the bread of [[her]36-mara house]1630-her house before [them]2112-the other children , and a jug of cold water . [They]2112-the other children had never seen bread before , and this was hard and dry , but [they]2112-the other children ate it without sign of distaste . [They]2112-the other children had never seen water before , but [they]2112-the other children drank without demur , one after [the other]2867-the other looking up from the draught with a face of glad astonishment . Then [she]36-mara led away [the smallest]2115-the smallest , and [the rest]655-the rest went trooping after [her]36-mara . With [her]36-mara own gentle hands , [they]2112-the other children told [me]0-i , [she]36-mara put [them]2112-the other children to bed on the floor of [the garret]460-the garret . [THEIR]2112-the other children night was a troubled one , and [they]2112-the other children brought a strange report of it into the day . Whether the fear of [their]2112-the other children sleep came out into [their]2112-the other children waking , or [their]2112-the other children waking fear sank with [them]2112-the other children into [their]2112-the other children dreams , awake or asleep [they]2112-the other children were never at rest from it . All night something seemed going on in [the house]112-the house — something silent , something terrible , something [they]2112-the other children were not to know . Never a sound awoke ; the darkness was one with the silence , and the silence was the terror . Once , a frightful wind filled [the house]112-the house , and shook its inside , [they]2112-the other children said , so that it quivered and trembled like a horse shaking himself ; but it was a silent wind that made not even a moan in [[their]2112-the other children chamber]2120-their chamber , and passed away like a soundless sob . [They]2112-the other children fell asleep . But [they]2112-the other children woke again with a great start . [They]2112-the other children thought [the house]112-the house was filling with water such as [they]2112-the other children had been drinking . It came from below , and swelled up until [the garret]460-the garret was full of it to the very roof . But it made no more sound than the wind , and when it sank away , [they]2112-the other children fell asleep dry and warm . The next time [they]2112-the other children woke , all the air , [they]2112-the other children said , inside and out , was full of cats . [They]2112-the other children swarmed — up and down , along and across , everywhere about [the room]126-the room . [They]2112-the other children felt [their]2112-the other children claws trying to get through the night - gowns lady [Mara]36-mara had put on [them]2112-the other children , but [they]2112-the other children could not ; and in the morning not one of [them]2112-the other children had a scratch . Through the dark suddenly , came the only sound [they]2112-the other children heard the night long — the far - off howl of the huge great - grandmother - cat in [the desert]3065-the desert : [she]36-mara must have been calling [her]36-mara little ones , [they]2112-the other children thought , for that instant the cats stopped , and all was still . Once more [they]2112-the other children fell fast asleep , and did not wake till the sun was rising . Such was the account [the children]2965-the children gave of [their]2965-the children experiences . But [I]0-i was with [the veiled woman]1277-the veiled woman and [the princess]3100-the princess all through the night : something of what took place [I]0-i saw ; much [I]0-i only felt ; and there was more which eye could not see , and heart only could in a measure understand . As soon as [Mara]36-mara left [the room]126-the room with [the children]2965-the children , [my]0-i eyes fell on [the white leopardess]1261-the white leopardess : [I]0-i thought [we]2112-the other children had left [her]1261-the white leopardess behind [us]2112-the other children , but there [she]1261-the white leopardess was , cowering in a corner . Apparently [she]1261-the white leopardess was in mortal terror of what [she]1261-the white leopardess might see . A lamp stood on the high chimney - piece , and sometimes [the room]126-the room seemed full of lamp - shadows , sometimes of cloudy forms . [The princess]3100-the princess lay on the settle by the wall , and seemed never to have moved hand or foot . It was a fearsome waiting . When [Mara]36-mara returned , [she]36-mara drew the settle with [Lilith]66-lilith upon it to the middle of [the room]126-the room , then sat down opposite [me]0-i , at the other side of the hearth . Between [us]2112-the other children burned a small fire . Something terrible was on its way ! The cloudy presences flickered and shook . [A silvery creature like a slowworm]2134-a silvery creature like a slowworm came crawling out from among [them]2965-the children , slowly crossed the clay floor , and crept into the fire . [We]2112-the other children sat motionless . The something came nearer . But the hours passed , midnight drew nigh , and there was no change . The night was very still . Not a sound broke the silence , not a rustle from the fire , not a crack from board or beam . Now and again [I]0-i felt a sort of heave , but whether in [the earth]2702-the earth or in the air or in the waters under [the earth]2702-the earth , whether in [my]0-i own body or in [my]0-i soul — whether it was anywhere , [I]0-i could not tell . A dread sense of judgment was upon [me]0-i . But [I]0-i was not afraid , for [I]0-i had ceased to care for aught save the thing that must be done . Suddenly it was midnight . [The muffled woman]1208-the muffled woman rose , turned toward the settle , and slowly unwound the long swathes that hid [her]1208-the muffled woman face : they dropped on the ground , and [she]1208-the muffled woman stepped over them . The feet of [the princess]3100-the princess were toward the hearth ; [Mara]36-mara went to [her]1208-the muffled woman head , and turning , stood behind it . Then [I]0-i saw [her]1208-the muffled woman face . It was lovely beyond speech — white and sad , heart - and - soul sad , but not unhappy , and [I]0-i knew it never could be unhappy . Great tears were running down [her]1208-the muffled woman cheeks : [she]1208-the muffled woman wiped them away with [her]1208-the muffled woman robe ; [her]1208-the muffled woman countenance grew very still , and [she]1208-the muffled woman wept no more . But for the pity in every line of [her]1208-the muffled woman expression , [she]1208-the muffled woman would have seemed severe . [She]1208-the muffled woman laid [her]1208-the muffled woman hand on the head of [the princess]3100-the princess — on the hair that grew low on the forehead , and stooping , breathed on the sallow brow . [The body]2140-the body shuddered . " Will [you]3100-the princess turn away from the wicked things [you]3100-the princess have been doing so long ? "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara gently . [The princess]3100-the princess did not answer . [Mara]36-mara put the question again , in the same soft , inviting tone . Still there was no sign of hearing . [She]1208-the muffled woman spoke the words a third time . Then [the seeming corpse]2142-the seeming corpse opened its mouth and answered , its words appearing to frame themselves of something else than sound.—I can not shape the thing further : sounds they were not , yet they were words to [me]0-i . " [I]1208-the muffled woman will not , "[1208-the muffled woman] [she]1208-the muffled woman said . " [I]1208-the muffled woman will be [myself]1208-the muffled woman and [not another]3721-not another ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " Alas , [you]1208-the muffled woman are another now , not [yourself]1208-the muffled woman ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [I]1208-the muffled woman would do after [my]1208-the muffled woman nature . "[3100-the princess] " Then , alas , [your]1208-the muffled woman hour is come ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [I]1208-the muffled woman care not . [I]1208-the muffled woman am what [I]1208-the muffled woman am ; [no one]134-no one can take from [me]1208-the muffled woman [myself]1208-the muffled woman ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [You]3100-the princess are not the Self [you]3100-the princess imagine . "[3100-the princess] " So long as [I]1208-the muffled woman feel [myself]1208-the muffled woman what it pleases [me]1208-the muffled woman to think [myself]1208-the muffled woman , [I]1208-the muffled woman care not . [I]1208-the muffled woman am content to be to [myself]1208-the muffled woman what [I]1208-the muffled woman would be . What [I]1208-the muffled woman choose to seem to [myself]1208-the muffled woman makes [me]1208-the muffled woman what [I]1208-the muffled woman am . [My]1208-the muffled woman own thought makes [me]1208-the muffled woman [me]1208-the muffled woman ; [my]1208-the muffled woman own thought of [myself]1208-the muffled woman is [me]1208-the muffled woman . [Another]603-another shall not make [me]1208-the muffled woman ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " But another has made [you]1208-the muffled woman , and can compel [you]1208-the muffled woman to see what [you]1208-the muffled woman have made [yourself]1208-the muffled woman . [You]1208-the muffled woman will not be able much longer to look to [yourself]1208-the muffled woman anything but what [he]603-another sees [you]1208-the muffled woman ! [You]1208-the muffled woman will not much longer have satisfaction in the thought of [yourself]1208-the muffled woman . At this moment [you]1208-the muffled woman are aware of the coming change ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [No one]134-no one ever made [me]1208-the muffled woman . [I]1208-the muffled woman defy that Power to unmake [me]1208-the muffled woman from [a free woman]1803-a free woman ! [You]1208-the muffled woman are [[his]603-another slave]3731-his slave , and [I]1208-the muffled woman defy [you]1208-the muffled woman ! [You]1208-the muffled woman may be able to torture [me]1208-the muffled woman — [I]1208-the muffled woman do not know , but [you]1208-the muffled woman shall not compel [me]1208-the muffled woman to anything against [my]1208-the muffled woman will ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " Such a compulsion would be without value . But there is a light that goes deeper than the will , a light that lights up the darkness behind it : that light can change [your]1208-the muffled woman will , can make it truly [yours]1208-the muffled woman and not another's — not the Shadow 's . Into the created can pour itself the creating will , and so redeem it ! "[3100-the princess] " That light shall not enter [me]1208-the muffled woman : [I]1208-the muffled woman hate it!—Begone , [slave]3732-slave ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [I]1208-the muffled woman am [no slave]3733-no slave , for [I]1208-the muffled woman love that light , and will with the deeper will which created [mine]1208-the muffled woman . There is [no slave]3733-no slave but [the creature that wills against its creator]3735-the creature that wills against its creator . Who is [a slave]1798-a slave but [she]1798-a slave who cries , ` [I]1208-the muffled woman am free , ' yet can not cease to exist ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [You]1208-the muffled woman speak foolishness from a cowering heart ! [You]1208-the muffled woman imagine [me]3100-the princess given over to [you]1208-the muffled woman : [I]3100-the princess defy [you]1208-the muffled woman ! [I]3100-the princess hold [myself]3100-the princess against [you]1208-the muffled woman ! What [I]3100-the princess choose to be , [you]1208-the muffled woman can not change . [I]3100-the princess will not be what [you]1208-the muffled woman think [me]3100-the princess — what [you]1208-the muffled woman say [I]3100-the princess am ! "[3100-the princess] " [I]1208-the muffled woman am sorry : [you]1208-the muffled woman must suffer ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " But be free ! "[1208-the muffled woman] " [She]1798-a slave alone is free who would make free ; [she]1798-a slave loves not freedom who would enslave : [she]1798-a slave is [herself]1798-a slave [a slave]1798-a slave . Every life , every will , every heart that came within [your]1208-the muffled woman ken , [you]1208-the muffled woman have sought to subdue : [you]1208-the muffled woman are [the slave of [every slave [you]1208-the muffled woman have made]3739-every slave you have made]3738-the slave of every slave you have made — [such a slave that [you]1208-the muffled woman do not know it!—See [your]1208-the muffled woman own self]3740-such a slave that you do not know it!—see your own self ! "[2143-her] [She]2143-her took [her]2143-her hand from the head of [the princess]3100-the princess , and went two backward paces from [her]2143-her . A soundless presence as of roaring flame possessed [the house]112-the house — the same , [I]0-i presume , that was to [the children]2965-the children a silent wind . Involuntarily [I]0-i turned to the hearth : its fire was a still small moveless glow . But [I]0-i saw the worm - thing come creeping out , white - hot , vivid as incandescent silver , the live heart of essential fire . Along the floor it crawled toward the settle , going very slow . Yet more slowly it crept up on it , and laid itself , as unwilling to go further , at the feet of [the princess]3100-the princess . [I]0-i rose and stole nearer . [Mara]36-mara stood motionless , as one that waits an event foreknown . The shining thing crawled on to a bare bony foot : it showed no suffering , neither was the settle scorched where the worm had lain . Slowly , very slowly , it crept along [her]3100-the princess robe until it reached [her]3100-the princess bosom , where it disappeared among the folds . The face of [the princess]3100-the princess lay stonily calm , the eyelids closed as over dead eyes ; and for some minutes nothing followed . At length , on the dry , parchment - like skin , began to appear drops as of the finest dew : in a moment they were as large as seed - pearls , ran together , and began to pour down in streams . [I]0-i darted forward to snatch the worm from [the poor withered bosom]2149-the poor withered bosom , and crush it with [my]0-i foot . But [Mara]36-mara , [Mother of Sorrow]85-mother , stepped between , and drew aside the closed edges of the robe : no serpent was there — no searing trail ; the creature had passed in by the centre of the black spot , and was piercing through the joints and marrow to the thoughts and intents of the heart . [The princess]3100-the princess gave one writhing , contorted shudder , and [I]0-i knew the worm was in [[her]3100-the princess secret chamber]2151-her secret chamber . " [She]3100-the princess is seeing [herself]3100-the princess ! "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara ; and laying [her]36-mara hand on [my]0-i arm , [she]36-mara drew [me]0-i three paces from the settle . Of a sudden [the princess]3100-the princess bent [her]3100-the princess body upward in an arch , then sprang to the floor , and stood erect . The horror in [her]3100-the princess face made [me]0-i tremble lest [her]3100-the princess eyes should open , and the sight of them overwhelm [me]0-i . [Her]3100-the princess bosom heaved and sank , but no breath issued . [Her]3100-the princess hair hung and dripped ; then it stood out from [her]3100-the princess head and emitted sparks ; again hung down , and poured the sweat of [her]3100-the princess torture on the floor . [I]0-i would have thrown [my]0-i arms about [her]3100-the princess , but [Mara]36-mara stopped [me]0-i . " [You]0-i can not go near [her]3100-the princess , "[36-mara] [she]36-mara said . " [She]3100-the princess is far away from [us]3741-us , afar in the hell of [her]3100-the princess self - consciousness . The central fire of [the universe]266-the universe is radiating into [her]3100-the princess the knowledge of good and evil , the knowledge of what [she]3100-the princess is . [She]3100-the princess sees at last the good [she]3100-the princess is not , the evil [she]3100-the princess is . [She]3100-the princess knows that [she]3100-the princess is [herself]3100-the princess the fire in which [she]3100-the princess is burning , but [she]3100-the princess does not know that the Light of Life is the heart of that fire . [Her]3100-the princess torment is that [she]3100-the princess is what [she]3100-the princess is . Do not fear for [her]3100-the princess ; [she]3100-the princess is not forsaken . No gentler way to help [her]3100-the princess was left . Wait and watch . "[36-mara] It may have been five minutes or five years that [she]2153-her stood thus — [I]0-i can not tell ; but at last [she]2153-her flung [herself]2153-her on [her]2153-her face . [Mara]36-mara went to [her]2153-her , and stood looking down upon [her]2153-her . Large tears fell from [her]36-mara eyes on the woman who had never wept , and would not weep . " Will [you]36-mara change [your]36-mara way ? "[36-mara] [she]36-mara said at length . " Why did [he]3743-he make [me]66-lilith such ? "[66-lilith] gasped [Lilith]66-lilith . " [I]66-lilith would have made [myself]66-lilith — oh , so different ! [I]66-lilith am glad it was [he]3743-he that made [me]66-lilith and not [I]66-lilith [myself]66-lilith ! [He]3743-he alone is to blame for what [I]66-lilith am ! Never would [I]66-lilith have made such a worthless thing ! [He]3743-he meant [me]66-lilith such that [I]66-lilith might know it and be miserable ! [I]66-lilith will not be made any longer ! "[66-lilith] " Unmake [yourself]36-mara , then , "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara . " Alas , [I]36-mara can not ! [You]36-mara know it , and mock [me]36-mara ! How often have [I]36-mara not agonised to cease , but [the tyrant]3744-the tyrant keeps [me]36-mara being ! [I]36-mara curse him!—Now let [him]3743-he kill [me]36-mara ! "[36-mara] The words came in jets as from a dying fountain . " Had [he]3743-he not made [you]36-mara , "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara , gently and slowly , " [you]36-mara could not even hate [him]3743-he . But [he]3743-he did not make [you]36-mara such . [You]36-mara have made [yourself]36-mara what [you]36-mara are.—Be of better cheer : [he]3743-he can remake [you]36-mara . "[36-mara] " [I]36-mara will not be remade ! "[36-mara] " [He]3743-he will not change [you]36-mara ; [he]3743-he will only restore [you]36-mara to what [you]36-mara were . "[36-mara] " [I]36-mara will not be aught of [his]3743-he making . "[36-mara] " Are [you]36-mara not willing to have that set right which [you]36-mara have set wrong ? "[36-mara] [She]36-mara lay silent ; [her]36-mara suffering seemed abated . " If [you]36-mara are willing , put [yourself]36-mara again on the settle . "[36-mara] " [I]36-mara will not , "[36-mara] [she]36-mara answered , forcing the words through [her]36-mara clenched teeth . A wind seemed to wake inside [the house]112-the house , blowing without sound or impact ; and a water began to rise that had no lap in its ripples , no sob in its swell . It was cold , but it did not benumb . Unseen and noiseless it came . It smote no sense in [me]0-i , yet [I]0-i knew it rising . [I]0-i saw it lift at last and float [her]36-mara . Gently it bore [her]36-mara , unable to resist , and left rather than laid [her]36-mara on the settle . Then it sank swiftly away . The strife of thought , accusing and excusing , began afresh , and gathered fierceness . The soul of [Lilith]66-lilith lay naked to the torture of pure interpenetrating inward light . [She]36-mara began to moan , and sigh deep sighs , then murmur as holding colloquy with [a dividual self]2155-a dividual self : [[her]36-mara queendom]2156-her queendom was no longer whole ; it was divided against itself . One moment [she]36-mara would exult as over [[her]36-mara worst enemy]2157-her worst enemy , and weep ; the next [she]36-mara would writhe as in the embrace of [a friend whom [her]36-mara soul hated]2158-a friend whom her soul hated , and laugh like [a demon]2159-a demon . At length [she]36-mara began what seemed a tale about [herself]36-mara , in a language so strange , and in forms so shadowy , that [I]0-i could but here and there understand a little . Yet the language seemed the primeval shape of one [I]0-i knew well , and the forms to belong to dreams which had once been [mine]0-i , but refused to be recalled . The tale appeared now and then to touch upon things that [Adam]58-adam had read from the disparted manuscript , and often to make allusion to influences and forces — vices too , [I]0-i could not help suspecting — with which [I]0-i was unacquainted . [She]36-mara ceased , and again came the horror in [her]36-mara hair , the sparkling and flowing alternate . [I]0-i sent a beseeching look to [Mara]36-mara . " Those , alas , are not the tears of repentance ! "[36-mara] [she]36-mara said . " The true tears gather in the eyes . Those are far more bitter , and not so good . Self - loathing is not sorrow . Yet it is good , for it marks a step in the way [home]2676-home , and in [the father]3746-the father 's arms [the prodigal]3747-the prodigal forgets the self [he]3747-the prodigal abominates . Once with [[his]3747-the prodigal father]433-his father , [he]3747-the prodigal is to [himself]3747-the prodigal of no more account . It will be so with [her]36-mara . "[36-mara] [She]36-mara went nearer and said , " Will [you]36-mara restore that which [you]36-mara have wrongfully taken ? "[36-mara] " [I]3100-the princess have taken nothing , "[3100-the princess] answered [the princess]3100-the princess , forcing out the words in spite of pain , " that [I]36-mara had not the right to take . [My]36-mara power to take manifested [my]36-mara right . "[36-mara] [Mara]36-mara left [her]36-mara . Gradually [my]0-i soul grew aware of an invisible darkness , a something more terrible than aught that had yet made itself felt . A horrible Nothingness , a Negation positive infolded [her]36-mara ; the border of its being that was yet no being , touched [me]0-i , and for one ghastly instant [I]0-i seemed alone with Death Absolute ! It was not the absence of everything [I]0-i felt , but the presence of Nothing . [The princess]3100-the princess dashed [herself]3100-the princess from the settle to the floor with an exceeding great and bitter cry . It was the recoil of Being from Annihilation . " For pity 's sake , "[3100-the princess] [she]3100-the princess shrieked , " tear [my]3100-the princess heart out , but let [me]3100-the princess live ! "[3100-the princess] With that there fell upon [her]3100-the princess , and upon [us]2162-us also who watched with [her]3100-the princess , the perfect calm as of a summer night . Suffering had all but reached the brim of [her]3100-the princess life 's cup , and a hand had emptied it ! [She]3100-the princess raised [her]3100-the princess head , half rose , and looked around [her]3100-the princess . A moment more , and [she]3100-the princess stood erect , with the air of [a conqueror]2163-a conqueror : [she]3100-the princess had won the battle ! Dareful [she]3100-the princess had met [[her]3100-the princess spiritual foes]2164-her spiritual foes ; [they]2164-her spiritual foes had withdrawn defeated ! [She]3100-the princess raised [her]3100-the princess withered arm above [her]3100-the princess head , a pæan of unholy triumph in [her]3100-the princess throat — when suddenly [her]3100-the princess eyes fixed in a ghastly stare.—What was [she]3100-the princess seeing ? [I]0-i looked , and saw : before [her]3100-the princess , cast from unseen heavenly mirror , stood the reflection of [herself]3100-the princess , and beside it a form of splendent beauty , [She]3100-the princess trembled , and sank again on the floor helpless . [She]3100-the princess knew the one what [God]33-god had intended [her]3100-the princess to be , the other what [she]3100-the princess had made [herself]3100-the princess . The rest of the night [she]3100-the princess lay motionless altogether . With the gray dawn growing in [the room]126-the room , [she]3100-the princess rose , turned to [Mara]36-mara , and said , in prideful humility , " [You]36-mara have conquered . Let [me]3100-the princess go into [the wilderness]1413-the wilderness and bewail [myself]3100-the princess . "[3100-the princess] [Mara]36-mara saw that [her]3100-the princess submission was not feigned , neither was it real . [She]36-mara looked at [her]3100-the princess a moment , and returned : " Begin , then , and set right in the place of wrong . "[36-mara] " [I]3100-the princess know not how , "[3100-the princess] [she]3100-the princess replied — with the look of [one who foresaw and feared the answer]2166-one who foresaw and feared the answer . " Open [thy]36-mara hand , and let that which is in it go . "[36-mara] A fierce refusal seemed to struggle for passage , but [she]3100-the princess kept it prisoned . " [I]3100-the princess can not , "[3100-the princess] [she]3100-the princess said . " [I]3100-the princess have no longer the power . Open it for [me]3100-the princess . "[3100-the princess] [She]3100-the princess held out the offending hand . It was more a paw than a hand . It seemed to [me]0-i plain that [she]3100-the princess could not open it . [Mara]36-mara did not even look at it . " [You]36-mara must open it [yourself]36-mara , "[3100-the princess] [she]3100-the princess said quietly . " [I]3100-the princess have told [you]36-mara [I]3100-the princess can not ! "[3100-the princess] " [You]36-mara can if [you]36-mara will — not indeed at once , but by persistent effort . What [you]36-mara have done , [you]36-mara do not yet wish undone — do not yet intend to undo ! "[3100-the princess] " [You]36-mara think so , [I]3100-the princess dare say , "[3100-the princess] rejoined [the princess]3100-the princess with a flash of insolence , " but [I]3100-the princess know that [I]3100-the princess can not open [my]3100-the princess hand ! "[3100-the princess] " [I]3100-the princess know [you]36-mara better than [you]36-mara know [yourself]36-mara , and [I]3100-the princess know [you]36-mara can . [You]36-mara have often opened it a little way . Without trouble and pain [you]36-mara can not open it quite , but [you]36-mara can open it . At worst [you]36-mara could beat it open ! [I]3100-the princess pray [you]36-mara , gather [your]36-mara strength , and open it wide . "[3100-the princess] " [I]3100-the princess will not try what [I]3100-the princess know impossible . It would be the part of [a fool]3256-a fool ! "[3100-the princess] " Which [you]36-mara have been playing all [your]36-mara life ! Oh , [you]36-mara are hard to teach ! "[3100-the princess] Defiance reappeared on the face of [the princess]3100-the princess . [She]3100-the princess turned [her]3100-the princess back on [Mara]36-mara , saying , " [I]3100-the princess know what [you]36-mara have been tormenting [me]3100-the princess for ! [You]36-mara have not succeeded , nor shall [you]36-mara succeed ! [You]36-mara shall yet find [me]3100-the princess stronger than [you]36-mara think ! [I]3100-the princess will yet be [mistress of [myself]3100-the princess]3751-mistress of myself ! [I]3100-the princess am still what [I]3100-the princess have always known [myself]3100-the princess — [queen of [Hell]11-hell]3752-queen of hell , and [mistress of [the worlds]3754-the worlds]3753-mistress of the worlds ! "[3100-the princess] Then came the most fearful thing of all . [I]0-i did not know what it was ; [I]0-i knew [myself]0-i unable to imagine it ; [I]0-i knew only that if it came near [me]0-i [I]0-i should die of terror ! [I]0-i now know that it was Life in Death — life dead , yet existent ; and [I]0-i knew that [Lilith]66-lilith had had glimpses , but only glimpses of it before : it had never been with [her]66-lilith until now . [She]66-lilith stood as [she]66-lilith had turned . [Mara]36-mara went and sat down by the fire . Fearing to stand alone with [the princess]3100-the princess , [I]0-i also went and sat again by the hearth . Something began to depart from [me]0-i . A sense of cold , yet not what [we]2170-we call cold , crept , not into , but out of [my]0-i being , and pervaded it . The lamp of life and the eternal fire seemed dying together , and [I]0-i about to be left with nought but the consciousness that [I]0-i had been alive . Mercifully , bereavement did not go so far , and [my]0-i thought went back to [Lilith]66-lilith . Something was taking place in [her]66-lilith which [we]2170-we did not know . [We]2170-we knew [we]2170-we did not feel what [she]66-lilith felt , but [we]2170-we knew [we]2170-we felt something of the misery it caused [her]66-lilith . The thing itself was in [her]66-lilith , not in [us]2170-we ; its reflex , [her]66-lilith misery , reached [us]2170-we , and was again reflected in [us]2170-we : [she]66-lilith was in the outer darkness , [we]2170-we present with [her]66-lilith who was in it ! [We]2170-we were not in the outer darkness ; had [we]2170-we been , [we]2170-we could not have been with [her]66-lilith ; [we]2170-we should have been timelessly , spacelessly , absolutely apart . The darkness knows neither the light nor itself ; only the light knows itself and the darkness also . None but [God]33-god hates evil and understands it . Something was gone from [her]66-lilith , which then first , by its absence , [she]66-lilith knew to have been with [her]66-lilith every moment of [her]66-lilith wicked years . The source of life had withdrawn itself ; all that was left [her]66-lilith of conscious being was the dregs of [her]66-lilith dead and corrupted life . [She]66-lilith stood rigid . [Mara]36-mara buried [her]36-mara head in [her]36-mara hands . [I]0-i gazed on the face of [one who knew existence but not love — knew nor life]2171-one who knew existence but not love — knew nor life , nor joy , nor good ; with [my]0-i eyes [I]0-i saw the face of [a live death]2172-a live death ! [She]66-lilith knew life only to know that it was dead , and that , in [her]66-lilith , death lived . It was not merely that life had ceased in [her]66-lilith , but that [she]66-lilith was consciously a dead thing . [She]66-lilith had killed [her]66-lilith life , and was dead — and knew it . [She]66-lilith must death it for ever and ever ! [She]66-lilith had tried [her]66-lilith hardest to unmake [herself]66-lilith , and could not ! [she]66-lilith was a dead life ! [she]66-lilith could not cease ! [she]66-lilith must be ! In [her]66-lilith face [I]0-i saw and read beyond its misery — saw in [its]2173-its dismay that the dismay behind it was more than it could manifest . It sent out a livid gloom ; the light that was in [her]66-lilith was darkness , and after its kind it shone . [She]66-lilith was what [God]33-god could not have created . [She]66-lilith had usurped beyond [her]66-lilith share in self - creation , and [her]66-lilith part had undone [His]33-god ! [She]66-lilith saw now what [she]66-lilith had made , and behold , it was not good ! [She]66-lilith was as a conscious corpse , whose coffin would never come to pieces , never set [her]66-lilith free ! [Her]66-lilith bodily eyes stood wide open , as if gazing into the heart of horror essential — [her]66-lilith own indestructible evil . [Her]66-lilith right hand also was now clenched — upon existent Nothing — [her]66-lilith inheritance ! But with [God]33-god all things are possible : [He]33-god can save even [the rich]2174-the rich ! Without change of look , without sign of purpose , [Lilith]66-lilith walked toward [Mara]36-mara . [She]66-lilith felt [her]36-mara coming , and rose to meet [her]36-mara . " [I]3100-the princess yield , "[3100-the princess] said [the princess]3100-the princess . " [I]3100-the princess can not hold out . [I]3100-the princess am defeated.—Not the less , [I]3100-the princess can not open [my]3100-the princess hand . "[3100-the princess] " Have [you]3100-the princess tried ? "[66-lilith] " [I]66-lilith am trying now with all [my]66-lilith might . "[66-lilith] " [I]3100-the princess will take [you]36-mara to [[my]3100-the princess father]105-my father . [You]36-mara have wronged [him]105-my father worst of the created , therefore [he]105-my father best of [the created]3756-the created can help [you]36-mara . "[3100-the princess] " How can [he]105-my father help [me]66-lilith ? "[66-lilith] " [He]105-my father will forgive [you]66-lilith . "[66-lilith] " Ah , if [he]105-my father would but help [me]3100-the princess to cease ! Not even that am [I]3100-the princess capable of ! [I]3100-the princess have no power over [myself]3100-the princess ; [I]3100-the princess am [a slave]1798-a slave ! [I]3100-the princess acknowledge it . Let [me]3100-the princess die . "[3100-the princess] " [A slave]1798-a slave [thou]3100-the princess art that shall one day be [a child]106-a child ! "[66-lilith] answered [Mara.—"Verily]86-mara.—"verily , [thou]3100-the princess shalt die , but not as [thou]3100-the princess thinkest . [Thou]3100-the princess shalt die out of death into life . Now is the Life for , that never was against [thee]3100-the princess ! "[3100-the princess] Like [[her]2176-her mother]3293-her mother , in whom lay [the motherhood of all [the world]108-the world]2178-the motherhood of all the world , [Mara]36-mara put [her]36-mara arms around [Lilith]66-lilith , and kissed [her]66-lilith on the forehead . The fiery - cold misery went out of [her]36-mara eyes , and [their]2180-their fountains filled . [She]36-mara lifted , and bore [her]66-lilith to [her]36-mara own bed in a corner of [the room]126-the room , laid [her]66-lilith softly upon it , and closed [her]66-lilith eyes with caressing hands . [Lilith]66-lilith lay and wept . [The Lady of Sorrow]2182-the lady of sorrow went to the door and opened it . [Morn]87-morn , with the Spring in [her]2182-the lady of sorrow arms , waited outside . Softly [they]2183-they stole in at the opened door , with a gentle wind in the skirts of [their]2183-they garments . It flowed and flowed about [Lilith]66-lilith , rippling the unknown , upwaking sea of [her]66-lilith life eternal ; rippling and to ripple it , until at length [she]66-lilith who had been but as a weed cast on [the dry sandy shore]2184-the dry sandy shore to wither , should know [herself]66-lilith [an inlet of [the everlasting ocean]2186-the everlasting ocean]2185-an inlet of the everlasting ocean , henceforth to flow into [her]66-lilith for ever , and ebb no more . [She]36-mara answered the morning wind with reviving breath , and began to listen . For in the skirts of the wind had come the rain — the soft rain that heals the mown , the many - wounded grass — soothing it with the sweetness of all music , the hush that lives between music and silence . It bedewed [the desert places around [the cottage]340-the cottage]2187-the desert places around the cottage , and [the sands of [Lilith]66-lilith 's heart]2189-the sands of lilith 's heart heard it , and drank it in . When [Mara]36-mara returned to sit by [her]36-mara bed , [her]36-mara tears were flowing softer than the rain , and soon [she]36-mara was fast asleep . [THE Mother of Sorrows]2190-the mother of sorrows rose , muffled [her]2190-the mother of sorrows face , and went to call [the Little Ones]47-the little ones . [They]47-the little ones slept as if all the night [they]47-the little ones had not moved , but the moment [she]2190-the mother of sorrows spoke [they]47-the little ones sprang to [their]47-the little ones feet , fresh as if new - made . Merrily down [the stair]201-the stair [they]47-the little ones followed [her]2190-the mother of sorrows , and [she]2190-the mother of sorrows brought [them]47-the little ones where [the princess]3100-the princess lay , [her]3100-the princess tears yet flowing as [she]3100-the princess slept . [Their]47-the little ones glad faces grew grave . [They]47-the little ones looked from [the princess]3100-the princess out on the rain , then back at [the princess]3100-the princess . " The sky is falling ! "[2690-one] said [one]2690-one . " The white juice is running out of [the princess]3100-the princess ! "[603-another] cried [another]603-another , with an awed look . " Is it rivers ? "[77-odu] asked [Odu]77-odu , gazing at the little streams that flowed adown [her]3100-the princess hollow cheeks . " Yes , "[36-mara] answered [Mara]36-mara , " — the most wonderful of all rivers . "[36-mara] " [I]77-odu thought rivers was bigger , and rushed , like a lot of Little Ones , making loud noises ! "[77-odu] [he]77-odu returned , looking at [me]0-i , from whom alone [he]77-odu had heard of rivers . " Look at [the rivers of the sky]3761-the rivers of the sky ! "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara . " See how [they]3761-the rivers of the sky come down to wake up the waters under [the earth]2702-the earth ! Soon will the rivers be flowing everywhere , merry and loud , like [thousands and thousands of happy children]3763-thousands and thousands of happy children . Oh , how glad [they]3761-the rivers of the sky will make [you]3764-you , [Little Ones]47-the little ones ! [You]3764-you have never seen any , and do not know how lovely is the water ! "[36-mara] " That will be the glad of the ground that [the princess]3100-the princess is grown good , "[77-odu] said [Odu]77-odu . " See the glad of the sky ! "[77-odu] " Are the rivers the glad of [the princess]3100-the princess ? "[81-luva] asked [Luva]81-luva . " [They]3761-the rivers of the sky are not [her]3100-the princess juice , for they are not red ! "[81-luva] " They are the juice inside the juice , "[36-mara] answered [Mara]36-mara . [Odu]77-odu put one finger to [his]77-odu eye , looked at it , and shook [his]77-odu head . " [Princess]3098-princess will not bite now ! "[81-luva] said [Luva]81-luva . " No ; [she]3098-princess will never do that again , "[36-mara] replied [Mara]36-mara . " — But now [we]3768-we must take [her]3098-princess nearer [home]2676-home . "[36-mara] " Is that a nest ? "[79-sozo] asked [Sozo]79-sozo . " Yes ; a very big nest . But [we]3768-we must take [her]3098-princess to another place first . "[79-sozo] " What is that ? "[36-mara] " Please are there any cats in [it]3770-it ? "[79-sozo] " Not one . [The nests]3774-the nests are too full of lovely dreams for one cat to get in . "[36-mara] " [We]3768-we shall be ready in a minute , "[77-odu] said [Odu]77-odu , and ran out , followed by all except [Luva]81-luva . [Lilith]66-lilith was now awake , and listening with a sad smile . " But [her]66-lilith rivers are running so fast ! "[81-luva] said [Luva]81-luva , who stood by [her]81-luva side and seemed unable to take [her]81-luva eyes from [her]81-luva face . " [Her]66-lilith robe is all — [I]81-luva do n't know what . [Clumsies]88-clumsies wo n't like it ! "[81-luva] " [They]88-clumsies wo n't mind it , "[36-mara] answered [Mara]36-mara . " [Those rivers]3775-those rivers are so clean that they make [the whole world]3776-the whole world clean . "[36-mara] [I]0-i had fallen asleep by the fire , but for some time had been awake and listening , and now rose . " It is time to mount , [Mr. Vane]27-mr. vane , "[2103-our hostess] said [[our]2197-our hostess]2103-our hostess . "[0-i] " There is an easy way across [the river - bed]554-the river - bed , which [I]2103-our hostess will show [you]0-i , "[2103-our hostess] [she]2103-our hostess answered ; " but [you]0-i must pass once more through the monsters . "[0-i] " [I]0-i fear for [the children]2965-the children , "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " [Fear]84-fear will not once come nigh [them]2965-the children , "[2103-our hostess] [she]2103-our hostess rejoined . [We]2197-our left [the cottage]340-the cottage . [The beasts]2200-the beasts stood waiting about the door . [Odu]77-odu was already on the neck of one of the two that were to carry [the princess]3100-the princess . [I]0-i mounted [Lona]44-lona 's horse ; [Mara]36-mara brought [her]44-lona body , and gave it [me]0-i in [my]0-i arms . When [she]44-lona came out again with [the princess]3100-the princess , a cry of delight arose from [the children]2965-the children : [she]44-lona was no longer muffled ! Gazing at [her]44-lona , and entranced with [her]44-lona loveliness , [the boys]3021-the boys forgot to receive [the princess]3100-the princess from [her]44-lona ; but the elephants took [Lilith]66-lilith tenderly with [their]3021-the boys trunks , one round [her]66-lilith body and one round [her]66-lilith knees , and , [Mara]36-mara helping , laid [her]66-lilith along between [them]3021-the boys . " Why does [the princess]3100-the princess want to go ? "[1849-a small boy] asked [a small boy]1849-a small boy . " [She]3100-the princess would keep good if [she]3100-the princess staid [here]2675-here ! "[1849-a small boy] " [She]3100-the princess wants to go , and [she]3100-the princess does not want to go : [we]3021-the boys are helping [her]3100-the princess , "[36-mara] answered [Mara]36-mara . " [She]3100-the princess will not keep good here . "[36-mara] " What are [you]36-mara helping [her]3100-the princess to do ? "[1849-a small boy] [he]1849-a small boy went on . " To go where [she]3100-the princess will get more help — help to open [her]3100-the princess hand , which has been closed for a thousand years . "[1849-a small boy] " So long ? Then [she]3100-the princess has learned to do without it : why should [she]3100-the princess open it now ? "[36-mara] " Because it is shut upon something that is not hers . "[36-mara] " Please , [lady Mara]36-mara , may [we]3021-the boys have some of [your]36-mara very dry bread before [we]3021-the boys go ? "[81-luva] said [Luva]81-luva . [Mara]36-mara smiled , and brought [them]2207-them four loaves and a great jug of water . " [We]2208-we will eat as [we]2208-we go , "[2207-them] [they]2207-them said . But [they]2207-them drank the water with delight . " [I]2207-them think , "[2207-them] remarked one of [them]2207-them , " it must be elephant - juice ! It makes [me]2207-them so strong ! "[2207-them] [We]2208-we set out , [the Lady of [Sorrow]89-the lady of sorrow walking with [us]2208-we , more beautiful than the sun]89-the lady of sorrow , and the white leopardess following [her]89-the lady of sorrow . [I]0-i thought [she]89-the lady of sorrow meant but to put [us]2208-we in the path across [the channels]789-the channels , but [I]0-i soon found [she]89-the lady of sorrow was going with [us]2208-we all the way . Then [I]0-i would have dismounted that [she]89-the lady of sorrow might ride , but [she]89-the lady of sorrow would not let [me]0-i . " [I]89-the lady of sorrow have no burden to carry , "[89-the lady of sorrow] [she]89-the lady of sorrow said . " [The children]2965-the children and [I]89-the lady of sorrow will walk together . "[89-the lady of sorrow] It was the loveliest of mornings ; the sun shone [his]2210-his brightest , and the wind blew [his]2210-his sweetest , but they did not comfort [the desert]3065-the desert , for [it]3065-the desert had no water . [We]2208-we crossed [the channels]789-the channels without difficulty , [the children]2965-the children gamboling about [Mara]36-mara all the way , but did not reach the top of [the ridge over [the bad burrow]2215-the bad burrow]2214-the ridge over the bad burrow until the sun was already in the act of disappearing . Then [I]0-i made [the Little Ones]47-the little ones mount [their]47-the little ones elephants , for the moon might be late , and [I]0-i could not help some anxiety about [them]47-the little ones . [The Lady of Sorrow]89-the lady of sorrow now led the way by [my]0-i side ; the elephants followed — the two that bore [the princess]3100-the princess in the centre ; [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess brought up the rear ; and just as [we]2208-we reached the frightful margin , the moon looked up and showed [the shallow basin lying before [us]2208-we untroubled]2218-the shallow basin lying before us untroubled . [Mara]36-mara stepped into it ; not a movement answered [her]36-mara tread or the feet of [my]0-i horse . But the moment that the elephants carrying [the princess]3100-the princess touched it , the seemingly solid earth began to heave and boil , and [the whole dread brood of the hellish nest]2220-the whole dread brood of the hellish nest was commoved . [Monsters uprose on all sides]2221-monsters uprose on all sides , every neck at full length , every beak and claw outstretched , every mouth agape . Long - billed heads , horribly jawed faces , knotty tentacles innumerable , went out after [Lilith]66-lilith . [She]66-lilith lay in an agony of fear , nor dared stir a finger . Whether [the hideous things]2222-the hideous things even saw [the children]2965-the children , [I]0-i doubt ; certainly not one of [them]2222-the hideous things touched [a child]106-a child ; [not one loathly member]2225-not one loathly member passed the live rampart of [her]66-lilith body - guard , to lay hold of [her]66-lilith . " [Little Ones]47-the little ones , "[0-i] [I]0-i cried , " keep [your]47-the little ones elephants close about [the princess]3100-the princess . Be brave ; [they]2965-the children will not touch [you]47-the little ones . "[0-i] " What will not touch [us]2965-the children ? [We]2965-the children do n't know what to be brave at ! "[2965-the children] [they]2965-the children answered ; and [I]0-i perceived [they]2965-the children were unaware of one of the deformities around [them]2965-the children . " Never mind then , "[0-i] [I]0-i returned ; " only keep close . "[0-i] [They]2965-the children were panoplied in [their]2965-the children blindness ! Incapacity to see was [their]2965-the children safety . What [they]2965-the children could nowise be aware of , could not hurt [them]2965-the children . But the hideous forms [I]0-i saw that night ! [Mara]36-mara was a few paces in front of [me]0-i when a solitary , bodiless head bounced on the path between [us]2226-us . The leopardess came rushing under the elephants from behind , and would have seized it , but , with frightful contortions of visage and a loathsome howl , it gave itself a rapid rotatory twist , sprang from [her]36-mara , and buried itself in the ground . The death in [my]0-i arms assoiling [me]0-i from fear , [I]0-i regarded [them]2965-the children all unmoved , although never , sure , was elsewhere beheld such a crew accursed ! [Mara]36-mara still went in front of [me]0-i , and [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess now walked close behind [her]36-mara , shivering often , for it was very cold , when suddenly the ground before [me]0-i to [my]0-i left began to heave , and a low wave of earth came slinking toward [us]2226-us . [It]2228-it rose higher as it drew hear ; out of it slouched [a dreadful head with fleshy tubes for hair , and opening a great oval mouth]2229-a dreadful head with fleshy tubes for hair , and opening a great oval mouth , snapped at [me]0-i . [The leopardess]3280-the leopardess sprang , but fell baffled beyond [it]2228-it . Almost under [our]2226-us feet , shot up the head of an enormous snake , with a lamping wallowing glare in its eyes . Again [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess rushed to the attack , but found nothing . At [a third monster]2232-a third monster [she]3280-the leopardess darted with like fury , and like failure — then sullenly ceased to heed the phantom - horde . But [I]0-i understood the peril and hastened the crossing — the rather that the moon was carrying [herself]3280-the leopardess strangely . Even as [she]3280-the leopardess rose [she]3280-the leopardess seemed ready to drop and give up the attempt as hopeless ; and since , [I]0-i saw [her]3280-the leopardess sink back once fully [her]3280-the leopardess own breadth . The arc [she]3280-the leopardess made was very low , and now [she]3280-the leopardess had begun to descend rapidly . [We]2226-us were almost over , when , between [us]2226-us and [the border of [the basin]2234-the basin]2233-the border of the basin , arose a long neck , on the top of which , like the blossom of some Stygian lily , sat what seemed the head of a corpse , its mouth half open , and full of canine teeth . [I]0-i went on ; it retreated , then drew aside . [The lady]951-the lady stepped on [the firm land]2236-the firm land , but [the leopardess between [us]2226-us]2237-the leopardess between us , roused once more , turned , and flew at the throat of the terror . [I]0-i remained where [I]0-i was to see the elephants , with [the princess]3100-the princess and [the children]2965-the children , safe on [the bank]998-the bank . Then [I]0-i turned to look after [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess . That moment the moon went down , For an instant [I]0-i saw [the leopardess]3280-the leopardess and the snake - monster convolved in a cloud of dust ; then darkness hid them . Trembling with fright , [my]0-i horse wheeled , and in three bounds overtook the elephants . As [we]2226-us came up with [them]2243-them , a shapeless jelly dropped on [the princess]3100-the princess . A white dove dropped immediately on the jelly , stabbing it with its beak . It made a squelching , sucking sound , and fell off . Then [I]0-i heard the voice of [a woman]344-a woman talking with [Mara]36-mara , and [I]0-i knew the voice . " [I]36-mara fear [she]3100-the princess is dead ! "[36-mara] said [Mara]36-mara . " [I]1418-the mother will send and find [her]3100-the princess , "[1418-the mother] answered [the mother]1418-the mother . " But why , [Mara]36-mara , shouldst [thou]3784-thou at all fear for [her]3100-the princess or for [any one]2700-any one ? Death can not hurt [her]3100-the princess who dies doing the work given [her]3100-the princess to do . "[36-mara] " [I]2247-i shall miss [her]3100-the princess sorely ; [she]3100-the princess is good and wise . Yet [I]2247-i would not have [her]3100-the princess live beyond [her]3100-the princess hour ! "[2247-i] " [She]3100-the princess has gone down with [the wicked]1685-the wicked ; [she]3100-the princess will rise with [the righteous]3787-the righteous . [We]3788-we shall see [her]3100-the princess again ere very long . "[2247-i] " [Mother]85-mother , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , although [I]0-i did not see [her]2247-i , " [we]3788-we come to [you]85-mother many , but most of [us]3788-we are [Little Ones]47-the little ones . Will [you]85-mother be able to receive [us]3788-we all ? "[0-i] " [You]0-i are welcome [every one]2818-every one , "[2247-i] [she]2247-i answered . " Sooner or later all will be [Little Ones]3790-little ones , for all must sleep in [[my]2247-i house]2896-my house ! It is well with [those that go to sleep young]3792-those that go to sleep young and [willing!—My husband]3793-willing!—my husband is even now preparing [her]2247-i couch for [Lilith]66-lilith . [She]66-lilith is neither young nor quite willing , but it is well indeed that [she]66-lilith is come . "[2247-i] [I]0-i heard no more . [Mother]1760-mother and [daughter]1897-daughter had gone away together through the dark . But [we]2250-we saw a light in the distance , and toward it [we]2250-we went stumbling over [the moor]342-the moor . Surely it is the loveliest in [the great world]3796-the great world ! "[358-his wife] When [we]2250-we reached the door , [Adam]58-adam welcomed [us]2250-we almost merrily . "[36-mara] " [I]66-lilith do not know [Him]58-adam ! "[66-lilith] murmured [Lilith]66-lilith , in a voice of fear and doubt . " If [thou]3100-the princess wilt nor eat nor drink , [Lilith]66-lilith , "[58-adam] said [Adam]58-adam , " come and see the place where [thou]3100-the princess shalt lie in peace . "[58-adam] [He]58-adam led the way through the door of death , and [she]66-lilith followed submissive . "[66-lilith] said [her]66-lilith voiceless lips : [I]0-i read [their]2269-their motion . " Who , [princess]3098-princess ? "[0-i] [I]0-i whispered . " [He]58-adam never dared touch [a child]106-a child , "[66-lilith] [she]66-lilith said . " Nor have [you]59-eve either ever hurt [a child]106-a child . And now [Death]90-death shall be [the atonemaker]3813-the atonemaker ; [you]59-eve shall sleep together . "[66-lilith] " [Wife]2800-wife , "[58-adam] said [Adam]58-adam , " let [us]3815-us first put [the children]2965-the children to bed , that [she]3100-the princess may see [them]2965-the children safe ! "[58-adam] [He]58-adam came back to fetch [them]2270-them . "[59-eve] " Show [me]59-eve then to [[my]59-eve grave]3819-my grave ; [I]59-eve am so weary [I]59-eve can live no longer . [I]59-eve must go to [the Shadow]92-the shadow — yet [I]59-eve would not ! "[59-eve] [She]59-eve did not , could not understand ! [She]59-eve struggled to rise , but fell at the feet of [Eve]59-eve . [The Mother]1418-the mother lifted , and carried [her]59-eve inward .
